1/2 CES wrapped up September last Friday w/ its 1st monthly assembly of 22-23! The assembly theme was "Hope Wins" & it also included a surprise visit from Buster the School Bus, which the district was able to purchase thanks to grant funding. https://t.co/x76Ph6mIW2
